Headline: #72 North Temporary Westbound Reroute near North Avenue/Laramie
ShortDescription: Westbound #72 North buses are rerouted via North Avenue, Cicero, Division, Central and North Avenue, due to fire department activity near North Avenue/Laramie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Westbound #72 North buses are temporarily rerouted via North Avenue, Cicero, Division, Central, then resume normal route on North Avenue, due to fire department activity near North Avenue/Laramie.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Kimball-bound Brown Line Service Delayed at Belmont
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Belmont due to signal problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Belmont due to signal problem.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#8 Halsted

#152 Addison

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
